section.p:
The scorpion men’s shaman falls dead with an uncannily human cry.
If you were wounded in that fight, you have been
poisoned
by the scorpion man’s venom. Subtract 1 from your COMBAT, THIEVERY and SCOUTING abilities, as you are severely weakened (though no ability can drop to zero). Note that you are poisoned - you can restore your ratings to normal if you get cured.
If you have some scorpion antidote, it will cure the poison immediately (cross off the antidote).

A quick search reveals what you were looking for - the
. Note it on your Adventure Sheet.
You steal out of the mound unnoticed and make it safely back to the village of Venefax, to the north. .
